name: Quantum Backpack
description: A tecnological advancement in quantum physics that allows you to store more than it should however this bag never made it to the public as the Military was also interested in this tech causing delays from double production of both Quantum Backpacks and Quantum Duty Backpacks.

name: UP.Quantum Backpack
description: This Quantum backpack has been upgraded from its predeccesor which would have been impossible but you Mad Being wanted to hoard even more even if it messed with pocket dimensions.

name: Quantum Duty Backpack
description: This military grade Quantum backpack is able to hold enough resources to create a car on the go or simply be able to carry all the rations Guns and ammo in the world.

name: UP.Quantum Duty Backpack
description: Your absolutely insane you risked creating a blackhole for your insatiable hoarding needs but hey the world is yours now literally.
